About Published on Jun 21, 2015

I'm Ben Joyce. I'm a designer and developer from Connecticut. I like to run, play music, and mess around on CodePen.

I spend a lot of time on the web. Here are some of my favorite sites to visit. I'll add more as I think of them:

  • CSS-Tricks
  • Hacker News
  • Designer News
  • Vice
  • LetsRun
  • theguardian
